abstract.text: from inception to first quarter of 2016 (latest date of creation for all records within databasearchived version).

A sensitive search strategy (Appendix 1) identified relevant economic evaluation studies using of probiotics for prophylaxis in hospitalized adults (age ≥18 years) and was based on a combination of the following subject headings and free-text keywords using alternative word spellings and endings:
